Specification: On-chip memory: 512 KB ROM, 128 KB RAM, 8 KB data flash memory
Vcc: 3.3 V to 5.5 V. MCU operation voltage range 1.6 V to 5.5 V
USB connector: VBUS (5 V input); VBUS is converted to 3.3 V by LDO.
Reset switch x 1; user switch x 1
Power indicator: green x 1*1, user: green x 2, debug/power: orange x 1
6-pin x 1, 8-pin x 2, 10-pin x 1 The interface is compatible with ArduinoTM Uno R3.
